name: Water Temple (Mitch Alexander)
description:
Recurring dreams of a labyrinthine public restroom where a glance is louder than a shout; loitering in the shadows under trees in a park with its own secret signs and signals; the shared company of men in cruising spaces.

Water Temple is a Twine adventure  game about cruising, dreams, hookups, and architecture, in accordance with The VIGILPHASE Manifesto. Note that this game is not-safe-for-work (NSFW).

Water Temple is currently in-development, and this build is intended as a proof-of-concept.
